message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a slightly larger share to account for potential future losses due to inflation.
Alice, your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable - I'm proposing a more balanced split this time, acknowledging the impact of inflation on both our shares.
Bob, time is money. I'm reducing my share, but let's settle this before inflation eats away at the value any further.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I've tried to be reasonable, but you're not negotiating in good faith.  Let's just split it evenly and end this.
